Quest.Name: Precious and Fragile Things Need Special Handling

CustomBehavior.Text: You must be an Draenei to run this profile

If.Condition: (Me.Class == WoWClass.Hunter) || (Me.Class == WoWClass.Priest) || (Me.Class == WoWClass.Mage) || (Me.Class == WoWClass.Warlock) || Me.Class == WoWClass.Shaman

CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for bag=0,4,1 do for slot=1,GetContainerNumSlots(bag),1 do local name=GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot) UseContainerItem(bag,slot) end end
/run for bag=0,4,1 do for slot=1,GetContainerNumSlots(bag),1 do local name=GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot) UseContainerItem(bag,slot) end end

CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for bag=0,4,1 do for slot=1,GetContainerNumSlots(bag),1 do local name=GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot) UseContainerItem(bag,slot) end end

CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for bag=0,4,1 do for slot=1,GetContainerNumSlots(bag),1 do local name=GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot) UseContainerItem(bag,slot) end end
/run for bag=0,4,1 do for slot=1,GetContainerNumSlots(bag),1 do local name=GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot) UseContainerItem(bag,slot) end end

TurnIn.QuestName: On the Wings of a Hippogryph
Precious and Fragile Things Need Special Handling

CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for bag=0,4,1 do for slot=1,GetContainerNumSlots(bag),1 do local name=GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot) UseContainerItem(bag,slot) end end

If.Condition: (Me.Class == WoWClass.Hunter) || (Me.Class == WoWClass.Priest) || (Me.Class == WoWClass.Mage) || (Me.Class == WoWClass.Warlock) || Me.Class == WoWClass.Shaman

CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for bag=0,4,1 do for slot=1,GetContainerNumSlots(bag),1 do local name=GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot) UseContainerItem(bag,slot) end end
/run for bag = 0,4,1 do for slot = 1, 32, 1 do local name = GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot); PickupContainerItem(bag,slot); DeleteCursorItem(); end; end
